{{short description|Adûnaic word}}
'''Magân''' is an [[Adûnaic]] word, meaning ''wright, builder''. 
==Etymology==
It derives from a possible verb *''mag'' ("to build") and the agentive ending ''[[-ân]]''

Ultimately the stem must be related to [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[MAƷ]]/[[MAG]] "to handle, use"
==Examples==
* [[Balkumagân]]

==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[Mahtan]], [[tano]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[tan]]''
